verses.text: Yuj chi' mamin Job, ab' tas ol vala', cham tza maclej ab' in lolonel tik:
Yujto a spac a lolonel chi' ayxoek' t'a yol in ti' yic svalani.
Ha tas nab'il vuuj, ol val t'ayach t'a stojolal yet' t'a smasanil in k'ool.
Ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, ha' ix in b'oani, a tz'ak'an in q'uinal, yuj chi' pitzan in.
Tak'vanh t'ayin tato syal a pacani, na tas ol utej a colan a b'a.
Lajanonnhej co chavanhil t'a yichanh Dios chi', anheja' t'a lum lum tik b'ob'il onh.
Yuj chi' max yal a xiv vuuj, max yal emnaquil ol ach vutej.
Icha tik ix vab' alani:
Wach'chom malaj in mul, malaj jab'oc in paltail, malaj chucal tzin k'ulej,
palta ha Dios sayan tas tz'aj yak'anoch t'a vib'anh, icha junok yajk'ol tzin yutej.
Ichato ix yak'och q'uen cadena t'a voc, q'uelannhejoch t'ayin b'ajtac tzin eq'ui, xa chi.
Palta a tas ix al tik manh wach'oclaj, yuj chi' ol vak' spac t'ayach: Ha Dios yelxo te ek'to yelk'och t'a quichanh a onh anima onh tik.
¿Tas yuj tzaloch t'a sat to max spac tas tzal t'ay?
Ha Dios chi' tzijtum macanhil syutej lolon sb'a, palta max nachajel-laj cuuj.
Ay b'aj slolon t'ak'walil, ma t'a vayichal, ma t'a ilvalil ayic te vaynac onh.
Ha Dios slolon t'a co pensar, yic tzonh cachjioch vaan t'a tas sco k'ulej, icha chi' tz'aj onh xib'tanpaxi.
Icha chi' tzonh yutej Dios, yic wach' squiq'uel co b'ha t'a skal chucal, yic manh comonoc squik'chaanh co b'a.
Icha chi' syutej Dios onh scolanel t'a chamel yic wach' max onh sateli.
Ay pax b'aj jun, a yet' yaelal syak' co cachnab'il Dios chi', scab'an val syail t'a co nivanil.
Masanil vael te wach' tz'ak'ji co wa''a, tonhej sco yajeli.
Stz'onb'i co nivanil, scheclajelta co b'aquil t'a co nivanil chi'.
Ichato sk'och co nivanil b'aj smucchaj eb' chamnac, ayxoek' t'a yol sk'ab' chamel.
Palta q'uinaloc t'a skal jantac eb' schecab' Dios, sik'jielta junok te niwan yelk'ochi, scoti yic tzul colvaj qued'oc, syalani tas smoj sco k'ulej,
sk'anan cuuj d'ha Dios to tz'ok' sk'ol t'ayonh. Sk'ananpax d'ha Dios chi' to max yiq'uel co q'uinal, yujto chequelxo mach stupan yuj co chucal chi'.
Icha chi' tz'aj sb'oxi co k'ool, haxo co nivanil tik tz'uninb'ixi, icha yic scotnac quelemal.
Ayic tzonh tevi d'ha Dios, syak'an svach'k'olal t'ayonh. Val t'a tzalajk'olal tzonh och ejmelal t'a yichanh Dios, scalan svach'k'olal t'a skal eb' quetanimail.
Scalan junjun onh t'a yichanh eb' anima icha tik: Ix och in mul, ix in k'ulej tas manh tojoloc, palta ha Dios maj yal sk'ol ix yak'och in yaelal t'a smojal.
Ha ix yutej to ix in scol t'a yol sk'ab' chamel, yuj chi' tzato vil sakil k'inal, xco chama.
Icha chi' tzonh yutej Dios, manh jun chaelocnhej sk'ulej icha chi',
yuj onh scolanelta t'a yol sk'ab' chamel, yic scak'an tzalajb'oc jab'ocxo co k'ool.
Mamin Job ab' val tas ol vala'. Numan tzach aji yacb'an tzin loloni.
Tato ay tas tza nib'ej tzala', syal alan t'ayin. Tato ay tas snachaj uuj, ala', tzin nib'ej malaj tas skan t'a ib'anh.
Tato malaj tas tzal jun, maclej ab' tas ol vala', ol ach in k'ayb'ej t'a jelanil, xchi vinhaj Eliú chi'.
